title: FSAE HV Tractive Battery System
summary: Researched, designed, and fabricated a high‑voltage tractive battery with control systems integration for Aztec Electric Racing.
description: Led energy storage design: reduced mass by ~8%, simplified wiring by ~70%, and lowered system losses by ~15% through topology updates, documentation standards, and validation procedures. Integrated safety, monitoring, and serviceability considerations.

title: Unsteady Aerodynamics Research
summary: Analyzed unsteady aerodynamics, wing structures, and aeroelastic effects using computational and experimental methods.
description: Under Dr. Luciano Demasi, contributed to studies on aeroelasticity and unsteady flow; authored/edited papers in LaTeX (MiKTeX) and managed data and experiment documentation.

title: IAM3D Drone Competition
summary: Project manager for SDSU ASME team; placed 4th internationally.
description: Coordinated procurement, budgeting, and design documentation; led meetings and implemented project tracking for multidisciplinary team delivery.
